infos.value: On a walk. I needed some fresh air before I suffocated in here.
You do wish to become my queen, do you not? Perhaps I misunderstood your intent...
That's neither here nor there. I simply despise being confined.
By the way...why was there such a ruckus in the great hall?
My, my! Then the welcome celebration must be in full swing.
Would you like to greet them?
Sheathe your spear for now. The dregs of Leonis might yet be of some useâ€”unexpected though it may be...
Huh... And what happens once their usefulness has run out?
